original_text: Hyenas and other wild animals will live there. Ostriches will live there, too. But people will never live there again. It will remain as empty as a desert. Hyenas and other wild animals will live there. Ostriches will live there, too. But people will never live there again. It will remain as empty as a desert. Hyenas and other wild animals will live there. Ostriches will live there, too. But people will never live there again. It will remain as empty as a desert. Hyenas and other wild animals will live there. Ostriches will live there, too. But people will never live there again. It will remain as empty as a desert. Hyenas and other wild animals will live there. Ostriches will live there, too. But people will never live there again. It will remain as empty as a desert. Hyenas and other wild animals will live there.
korean_text: 그러므로 사막의 들짐승이 승냥이와 함께 거기에 살겠고 타조도 그 가운데에 살 것이요 영원히 주민이 없으며 대대에 살 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Hyenas and other wild animals will live there.
sentences.korean_translation: 하이에나와 다른 야생 동물들이 그곳에 살 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Ostriches will live there, too.
sentences.korean_translation: 타조도 그곳에 살 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: But people will never live there again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들은 다시는 그곳에 살지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will remain as empty as a desert.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 사막처럼 텅 비어 있을 것입니다.
